definition: to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~
to dye/to catch (a disease)/to acquire (bad habits etc)/to contaminate/to add color washes to a painting

sentences.english: Objective To study the infectious state of TT virus in patients with non A-E hepatitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解非甲非戊型肝炎患者TT病毒感染狀況。

sentences.english: To research the affect of tattoo eyebrow on the infection of viral hepatitis type C in women.
sentences.chinese: 研究紋眉在女性丙型肝炎病毒感染中的作用。

sentences.english: Morphology of HSV-1 was identified by inverted microscope.
sentences.chinese: 利用倒置顯微鏡對病毒感染進行形態學鑑定。

sentences.english: There are currently no drugs or vaccines available to treat Hendra virus infection.
sentences.chinese: 目前沒有能夠用於治療亨德拉病毒感染的藥品或疫苗。

sentences.english: HGV infection rates in all clinical types had not difference.
sentences.chinese: 各臨牀類型間庚型肝炎病毒感染無明顯差別。

sentences.english: When the larve was infected with recombinant virus, the liquefaction couldn't be observed.
sentences.chinese: 用所得到的重組病毒感染蟲體，發現蟲體不液化。

sentences.english: But we are seeing virus infections in poultry that are not transmitted by wild birds.
sentences.chinese: 但是我們現在看到的家禽病毒感染並非由野鳥傳播的。

sentences.english: This is cytomegalovirus infection in the lung.
sentences.chinese: 這是肺鉅細胞病毒感染。

sentences.english: Some of my men are infected with this virus.
sentences.chinese: 有些我的人就被這種病毒感染了。

sentences.english: Previous studies had demonstrated the association between NPC and Epstein-Barr virus (EBV) infection.
sentences.chinese: 研究證明該腫瘤的發生和EB病毒感染有密切關係。

sentences.english: Winter is usually the peak season for norovirus outbreaks in Japan .
sentences.chinese: 冬季通常是日本爆發諾沃克病毒感染的高峯期。

sentences.english: Conclusion CMV infection is related to coronary heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 結論鉅細胞病毒感染與冠心病之間關係密切。

sentences.english: Water contamination was to blame for the norovirus outbreak.
sentences.chinese: 所以，這次病毒感染是水污染引起的，應表述爲。

sentences.english: VP35 interferes with the natural resistance of host cells against viral infections.
sentences.chinese: VP35干擾了宿主細胞對病毒感染的天然抵抗能力。

sentences.english: The presence of an associated skin rash supports the likelihood of RSV infection.
sentences.chinese: 如果患者同時出現皮疹，則支持呼吸道合胞病毒感染。

sentences.english: What are the risks of enterovirus infections in pregnancy?
sentences.chinese: 懷孕期間腸病毒感染的風險有多大？
